page.title: 11Cardboard Factory P.Wood.
page.content: Before Fairmile Cardboard Containers Ltd. became a factory,the building used to be a blacksmith's. Horses and carts would have entered through what is now the factory and would have left through what is now the Saddle Room Restaurant. The cardboard is brought by lorry and unloaded by a fork lift truck.It is then placed on smaller pallets and put on the pallet track which then carries the cardboard to the guillotine where it is cut to size. The cardboard is then taken to the cutting and creasing machine,and from there to the glueing machine which glues the sides of the containers.The containers are then ready for use. Waste cardboard is put into a bailer where it is compressed. The firm employs local labour.
